author: ratz
title: basic bricks, basically
review:
personally i'd like more special colours inside those brick boxes, in this one there is orange, which is a good start. one more shade of blue or green, or a bit of grey - that would be perfect.
also i am missing boxes with assorted plates. ok, you can order those polybags at s@h, but you hardly get them at normal toy stores. plates for everyone!

author: asianlego
title: Load of bricks!
review:
I received this free alongside the 5493 Emergency Rescue Box. This bulk set are all plain basic bricks.. and also contains some new bricks such as orange bricks although the amount of orange bricks are very little. These sets are value for money. If they had more grey pieces then it would be great for castle MOCers.

-asianlego
